transcript:
Customer: Haan sir bolo aur kya.
H Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Abhi recording line hai?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir aap bataiye sir.
Customer: To mera personal number maine aapko de diya hai recording line se baat ho rahi hai sir. Bataiye sir matlab 22 baar na main aapka profile hi khol raha hu hold ko open kijiye.
Executive: Nahi pehle usse pehle kuch aur baat karni hai mujhe.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir bataiye.
Customer: Usse pehle baat ye karni hai ki aapne mujhe bola 5 minute baad main call karunga uske baad main jab aapko call kar raha hu aap ye keh rahe hai ki mujhe personal number de diya hai aapka ab mujhe recorded line se call karni hoti hai. Aap apne employees ko samjhaiye ki wo personal number na de mujhe.
Executive: Sir personal number kyuki office ke baad kya hota hai na sir kabhi kabhi office personal lagte nahi hai 6 baje ke baad in sab pe call nahi jaati hai. Wo bhi personal number nahi hai us par aap karenge to sir 6 baje ke baad bhi aap baat kar sakte hai. Is karan se hum dete hai sir.
Customer: That is totally your internal matter I don't care about that right?
Executive: Ye baki email id bhi hai aapki.
Customer: To aapne aapko apni team ko samjhana chahiye ki personal number dena chahiye ya nahi dena chahiye aur agar mujhe diya hai main 50 baar call lagaunga us number pe. Kyuki maine aapka number aapse mujhe aapka number diya gaya hai. Maine khud se nahi aapka kahi se search karke nikala hai.
Executive: To koi baat nahi sir main matlab sir main system par aake hi call karunga na maine jab aapko bola main call karunga.
Customer: Aap mujhe time nahi de sakte hai. Wo bhi tab jab aapke employee ne mujhe number diya hai ki 5 minute baad main call karunga tab aapko samjhaunga right?
Executive: Aap bataiye sir issue kya hai aapko.
Customer: Issue ye hai aur ye sab cheeze aur ye sab cheeze jo aap bata rahe ho ki Anjali Bisht aur ye sab lekin main bhai sahab main 11 saal apni naukri kari kari hai zindagi mein hai na aur sales mein hi naukri karke aaya hu main.
Executive: Sir mujhe kya bata rahe hai samajh nahi aa raha. Ye sab lead ke notes dekhiye kisne kis kisne notes dale hai main sab bata sakta hu ki kis kisne lead pe kaam kiya hai.
Customer: Mujhe sab idea hai mujhe pata hai ki cheeze kaise kaam karti hai. Hai na?
Executive: To sir bataiye to aap bataiye na kya dikkat kaha par aa rahi hai sir conversion abhi aapki profile live hue 10 din hua hai. 10 din mein sir minimum.
Customer: Bhai mujhe conversion chahiye hi nahi. Mujhe chahiye lead genuine.
Executive: To sir genuine lead hi to mil rahi hai sir agar 70 ke 70 bhi convert thodi na honge sir.
Customer: Nahi convert customer conversion chahiye hi nahi bhai main 50 lead pe. Theek hai? Ab aap ek baat suniye main call kar raha hu 50 lead pe ek din mein. Agar example ke liye mujhe ek din mein 50 lead agar milti hai main karunga call 50 lead pe. Agar convert nahi ho pa rahi hai agar wo lead genuine hai to meri problem hai main samjhunga is cheez ko ki main kaha kam kar raha hu mere product mein kami hai ya mere baat karne mein kami hai wo meri kami mani jayegi. Lekin agar main call karu kisi main agar kisi lead pe call karu aur samne wo mujhse ye bole ki maine to bechne ke liye dala tha IndiaMART pe to aapki team kya verify kar rahi hai?
Executive: Sir jaise ek do lead abhi aap kharidiye ek mere paas lead aayi hai cow dung ki 2000 kg ki Delhi se. Order value hai 50000 se 1 lakh ka isko purchase karke dekhiye kya dikkat hai.
Customer: Nahi ek second aap mujhe bol rahe main apni ek lead waste kar du aapke kehne pe chalo kar de deta hu. Ek second isko by lead system par hai na ki aap? Main system par hi hu.
Executive: System par ek baar aake dekhiye sir by lead pe dekhegi by lead location all India ha cow dung ka lead hai 2000 kg ka.
Customer: Haan haan Delhi ki hai abhi dekhiye maine.
Executive: Delhi ki aayi hai. To ye cow dung aapke product se relevant hai ab isme buyer buyer se baat kijiye kya bol rahe hai buyer aapko ye.
Customer: Nahi wo buyer main abhi call karu kis number se karni hoti hai mujhe bhi call main isi main karunga call usko bhi abhi maine consume ki hui hai wo.
Executive: Theek hai ek baar consume kijiyega paanch saat lead ka mujhe feedback dega 10 ke 10 ke sare ki sare buyer yahi bol rahe hai aapko ki nahi ji maine requirement dali hai.
Customer: Abhi tak jo usme se bata dunga na main feedback.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aap note kar lijiye.
Executive: Abhi aapne total by lead jo consume kiya hai sir 11 by lead consume kiya hai aapne. 16 se 22 November mein 11 by lead consume kiya hai one week aapka live hua hai aur abhi 23 abhi aaj aapne consume kiya total aapne 12 by lead ab tak consume kar rakhi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To 12 by lead mein kya feedback raha sir aapka 12 mein kya raha 12 ke 12 by lead ka?
Customer: Maine lead manager open kar liya hai ab aap ek second de do mujhe main check kar raha hu.
Customer: Pehli cheez aapne aap isme ek lead dekho Kartik Earth Farm ke naam se.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye maine consume ki hai 19 November check karo aap.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai dikh gayi aapko?
Executive: Ji bilkul sir.
Customer: Theek hai abhi is lead pe maine call kiya 19 November ko mere paas pura data hai aur mere paas sari calls bhi hai agar aap in case agar in future kabhi zarurat padti hai to aap mujhe call bhi sun sakte hai theek hai ab main batata hu aapko ki isne mujhe bola ki main sirf check kar raha tha ki lead ki lead sorry lead nahi ki kya cow dung product mil sakta hai ya nahi mil sakta hai jab maine IndiaMART purchase kiya tha tab mujhe ye bola gaya tha ki lead hum tabhi create karte hai jab hamari team uske sath verify kar leti hai ki aapko product chahiye ki bechna hai kitna chahiye kitna probable order minimum order quantity kya hogi probable order value kya hogi ye sab cheeze karte hai wo right?
Executive: Sir har lead ko call nahi kiya jata sir main aapko yaha clear kar raha hu kyuki sir lakho business generate hoti hai jo pehli baar buyer call karte hai ya pehla number se verify karte hai unko call karte hai otherwise hum un lead ko tabhi post karte hai buyer requirement fulfill karta hai pehle to OTP dalega mobile number par us par kuch question hum unse puchte hai wo fill up karte hai fir lead post ho jati hai ye hota hai lead post acha acha theek hai theek hai aap keh rahe ho ki aap lakho lead generate hoti hai aur aur lead call nahi hota ek second mujhe aap ek baar mujhe sun lo do minute ke liye uske baad aap bolna theek hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aapne sabse pehle mujhe bola ki recorded line se call karni hoti hai aap abhi ye line recorded hai?
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Theek hai ab aap meri baat suniye aapne bola ki buyer hum har ek buyer ko lakho lead generate hoti hai har ek ko call nahi karte mujhse kuch questions hum usse app ke through jo bhi wo app download kar raha hai ya fir website pe ja raha hai to wo lead apni create kar raha hai ki chahe bechne ki kar raha ho ya karne ki kar raha ho wo apna rating dalega OTP dalega sab kuch dalega theek hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap usko call nahi karte hai maine kis liye paisa diya hai aapko aap mujhe ye cheez samjha dijiye bas.
Executive: Sir aapne paisa isliye diya hai ki IndiaMART par aapka promotion ho buyer aapko nahi maine IndiaMART ko paisa kis liye diya hai ye cheez samjha dijiye mujhe. Haan IndiaMART ko sir paisa aapne diya hai ki aapko IndiaMART se kuch kaam mile sir business mile promotion ho isliye aapne diya hai. Hai na? Isiliye diya hai na ki mujhe IndiaMART se business mile.
Executive: Bilkul sir. Ab ye mera matter nahi hai ki IndiaMART kisko call kar raha hai kisko nahi kar raha hai IndiaMART ne mujhe kya promise kiya tha jab purchase karte time ki hum lead verify karke denge aapko hum aapko aisi hi lead denge aur yaha tak ki ye bhi bola hai mujhe ki mujhe wo bhi sari calls hai mere paas ki hum GST verified wale custom buyer hi dalte hai ye kar chalo wo cheez main samajh sakta hu ki business mein ye sab sale mein ye sab cheeze chalti hai.
Executive: 10 15% ho jati hai cheeze haan.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Main samajh sakta hu is cheez ko lekin basic jo cheez hai wo to mujhe mile basic kya hai basic ye hai ki mujhe lead at least aisi mile ki samne wala kharidne wala ho na ki bechne wala ho ab bechne wale chahiye ho main market mein subah se sham tak jhula leke nikal jaunga main tab 50 lead generate kar launga yaar.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Hai na maine 11 saal yahi kiya hai. Hmm hmm tab maine apna khud ka business banaya hai aur main aise kaam nahi kar sakta.
Executive: Sir aap sorry main bol raha hu ki aap thoda sa main abhi kuch product aapke manager mein abhi bola ki uske sath phone call par tha ki main kuch product aapke lead aur aapke liye wo karwata hu kuch product bhi aur dalwata hu usse lead aur improve hogi aur aap aise one month use kijiye one month ke baad mujhe feedback bataiye pure one month ka kya feedback hai aap man lo one week one mein aapne aapko 68 lead di ab 68 ka ek data bana lijiye 68 lead mein kitni lead aisi aapko rahi jo buyer ne man lo 68 mein aapne bola 20 lead mujhe aisi mili jo buyer ne mujhe bola ki mujhe aap se wo kharidna nahi bechna hai 40 lead aisi mili jis buyer ne aap se quotation liya aur 20 lead aapke phone nahi utha jo bhi aapka data bana lijiye us data ko sir main aake management mein represent karunga bhai sir to ye problem hai fir aap jaise solution mangenge solution aapko provide kara denge sir.
Customer: Chalo theek hai main maan liya ab mujhe ab main main ek meri ye condition hai isme condition main kyuki maine kiya hai main condition ek nahi main 10 bhi rakh sakta hu ab aap meri condition sun lijiye aap IndiaMART ko ye cheez meri feedback pahucha dijiyega hai na aap IndiaMART ke employee hai. Main aaj ek mail karunga.
Customer: Theek hai IndiaMART ko.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Aapke jo bhi grievance department jo bhi hoga main usko ek mail karunga usme ye bolunga ki aapke kisi employee ne mujhe ye bola hai ki ek month aap isko use karke dekhiye main ek month nahi main do month ke liye likh dunga usme lekin agar same cheez mere paas do month baad bhi agar continue rehti hai mujhe pura paisa wapas chahiye with GST.
Executive: Pura matlab aisa refund ka main aapko to aisa kuch nahi bol raha hu ki refund ka milega aapko sale jisne kiya tha ek baar unko conference par lijiye unhone aapko kya comment kiya hum to service dene wale hai sir.
Customer: Exactly ab aap apna call disconnect kar dijiye main usi se baat kar lunga thank you so much.
Executive: Baat kar lijiye main aapko aisa main to service ke liye baitha hu na sir aap conference par le lijiye kya thank you you can disconnect the call good bye.
Executive: Okay sir koi issue nahi hai sir main aisa kuch bolunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants genuine leads, not just for selling.

- Expresses frustration with lead quality and verification.

- Objects to receiving personal numbers from employees.

- Wants to know why he paid IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Executive suggested using leads for a month.

- Executive offered to escalate feedback to management.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a mail to IndiaMART.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, verification, lead quality
